name: The State of Philippine Blockchain & Crypto in 2018: Key Developments
description:
I presented the state of Philippine Blockchain and Cryptocurrency for 2018 at the "Blockchain, DLT and DTL (Feb. 7, 2019)" in Makati City, Philippines. Drink Talk Learn (DTL) is a meetup where participants deliver presentations on interesting subjects while drinking and having a great time. 

Anyone following the Philippine crypto scene from then until now will see how the ecosystem has grown in four years -- from wallets and onramps in 2018 to DeFi apps, NFT artists and Play-to-earn players in 2021.
